context: Square (now Block) saw Cash App explode during the pandemic with 36M monthly users. The company enabled Bitcoin trading and focused on building an ecosystem across sellers and consumers.

competitors.name: PayPal/Venmo
competitors.notes: Major P2P and merchant payment competitor

competitors.name: Lightspeed
competitors.notes: Retail and restaurant POS and commerce

competitors.name: Coinbase
competitors.notes: Crypto exchange competing with Cash App Bitcoin
